live_updates: Services are disrupted due to Hydro outages caused by wildfire activity. Technicians will work to repair services once power is restored, and when it has been deemed safe to access the area. We will provide further updates as they become available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
40646.summary: Some customers in the Westside area of Vernon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40646.title: Aug 16 – Vernon (Westside) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Hydro has restored power to the area, after which our technicians confirmed our services began working. Thank you for your patience.
Hydro continues to work to restore power.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 20:50. Please stay tuned for updates.

40734.title: Aug 16 – Juniper Ridge | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Hydro continues to work to restore power. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 00:45. Please stay tuned for updates

40738.title: Aug 16 - Winnipeg (Wosley) | Service Interruption (Fix in Progress)
